# Source template:
# added_folders/templates/common/scripted_effects/godherja/GH_cultural_coa_effects.txt.jinja
#
# Please avoid manually editing this file: your changes WILL be overwritten when it gets regenerated.
# Instead, edit the source template and/or variables, then run render_templates.bat .

initialize_preset_cultural_frame_effect = {
	every_culture_global = {
		limit = {
			NOR = {
				
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_aversarian
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_kikarsag
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_dergi
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_afoseniai
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_enynanthari
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_iseni
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_oghainos
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_kelthiunai

				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_nakahanii
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_kevaali
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_veparstva
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_ashkeschi
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_asariyna
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_dadkawji

				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_kharadamatian

				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_kosharan
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_arapa
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_daravani
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_zanaumaures
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_takopara
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_tiemanam
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_aekershaani
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_mtuwe
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_madikirib
				
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_zarasadari
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_thyssae
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_canian
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_kemsari
				
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_damotan
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_hadiyan
				
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_redlander
				
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_agadari
				
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_clanlander
				
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_wasteland
			}
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = cultural_frame_var
			value = flag:default_frame
		}
	}
	
	every_culture_global = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_aversarian
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_kikarsag
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_dergi
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_afoseniai

				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_abadelos
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_urkarith
			}
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = cultural_frame_var
			value = flag:aversarian_frame
		}
	}

		limit = {
			OR = {
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_sjalvolki

		limit = {
			OR = {

			}
		}
		set_variable = {

			value = flag:iyrossi_frame
		}

		limit = {
			OR = {
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_vhanavid
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_sarminian

		}

		limit = {
			OR = {
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_easterner
			}
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = cultural_frame_var
			value = flag:kathuni_frame
		}
	}
	
	every_culture_global = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_dayatemi
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_adhata

			}
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = cultural_frame_var
			value = flag:kashiryan_frame
		}
	}
	
	every_culture_global = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_sarradonian
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_dawic

		set_variable = {
			name = cultural_frame_var
			value = flag:sarradonian_frame
		}
	}
	
	every_culture_global = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_zarasadari
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_thyssae
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_canian
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_kemsari
			}
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = cultural_frame_var
			value = flag:amsari_frame
		}
	}
	
	every_culture_global = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_damotan
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_hadiyan
			}
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = cultural_frame_var
			value = flag:damotan_frame
		}
	}
	
	every_culture_global = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_redlander
			}
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = cultural_frame_var
			value = flag:redlander_frame
		}
	}
	
	every_culture_global = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_agadari
			}
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = cultural_frame_var
			value = flag:agadari_frame
		}
	}
	
	every_culture_global = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				has_cultural_pillar = heritage_clanlander
			}
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = cultural_frame_var
			value = flag:clanlander_frame
		}
	}
	
}

# For handling divergences and hybridizations
assign_cultural_frame_to_created_culture_effect = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			scope:founder = {
				has_variable = cultural_frame_hybrid
			}
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = cultural_frame_var
			value = scope:founder.var:cultural_frame_hybrid
		}
	}
	else = {
		set_variable = {
			name = cultural_frame_var
			value = scope:parent_culture_1.var:cultural_frame_var
		}
	}
}
